qas.question: What year was Canada united in a confederation?
The forces of what countries did people serve before the unification?
What is one of the threats that faced them?
Early on, what did they defend against with the British?
What year did the American Revolutionary War take place?
Who aided in defence during the Fenian Rebellion?
Who aided in defence during the Red River Raids?
When were Canadian army units formed?
What year wasn't Canada united in a confederation?
The forces of what countries didn't people serve before the unification?
What is one of the threats that didn't faced them?
Early on, what didn't they defend against with the British?

context: Prior to Confederation in <a0_0><b5_0><b10_0>1867<b10_0/><b5_0/><a0_0/>, residents of the colonies in what is now Canada served as regular members of <a1_0><b11_0>French and <b7_0><b8_0>British forces<b11_0/><b8_0/><b7_0/><a1_0/> and in local militia groups. The latter aided in the defence of their respective territories against attacks by other <a2_0><b12_0>European powers<b12_0/><a2_0/>, Aboriginal peoples, and later American forces during <a3_0>the <b13_0>American Revolutionary War<b13_0/><a3_0/> and War of <b6_0>1812<b6_0/>, as well as in the Fenian raids, Red River Rebellion, and North-West Rebellion. Consequently, the lineages of some Canadian army units stretch back to the <b9_0>early 19th century<b9_0/>, when militia units were formed to assist in the defence of British North America against <a4_0><b14_0>invasion by the United States<b14_0/><a4_0/>.
